Who can register on Xaba Shikanisha?
Will I be charged for using the service?
How do I activate my account?
How do I update my details?
How do I view my profile?
How do I change my notification number?
How do I refer a friend?
How do I add a profession?
How do I become an agent?
Where can I find the Xaba Terms and Conditions?
How do I start earning points?
How does the points system work?
How do I redeem my Xaba Points?
How do I check my balance?

Xaba is a social movement that is enriching lives by creating job connections in Agri-business, Construction, Hospitality and Manufacturing industries. Searching and hiring workers in the informal sector is now easier on Xaba.

Xaba Shikanisha is an easy, cost effective and faster way to connect employers with employees. Employers are able to cherry pick blue-collar workers best suited for their projects in a matter of minutes and in simplified steps. Employees/Workers who are registered on Xaba Shikanisha through the USSD process *844# increase their opportunity of getting hired for jobs closest to them.

Xaba targets employees/workers and employers in the blue-collar market specializing in Agri-business, Construction, Hospitality and Manufacturing industries. \n\t\u2022 Employees/Workers can register to increase their chances of getting hired \n\t\u2022 Employers can find verified workers with the right skillset for their projects

Employees/Workers are able to register for free by dialling *884# and completing the registration process. By registering, your details can be viewed by different employers increasing your chances for future job opportunities.

Employee/Worker Registration Steps:
		a. Dial *884#
		b. Enter ID
		c. Confirm ID
		d. Select language
		e. Select industry
		f. Select the first letter of your profession category e.g. A-R or S-Z
		g. Choose specific profession
		h. Select county of residence
		i. Enter an agent ID or number of person who referred you or enter 00 to skip
		j. Insert your preferred number to receive job alerts.
		k. Receive registration confirmation SMS with your PIN

You can also register using our Xaba Agent App. Simply download the app, click ‘register now’ on the main page and follow the steps.

Employer Registration Steps
		a. Register on www.xaba.org
		b. Create an account by filling in the Company Registration Form
		c. Activate your account by clicking link sent to your e-mail address
		d. Log-in to your account
		e. Access the dashboard and add new projects/review reports
		f. Start shortlisting workers
		g. Send notification to shortlisted workers
		h. Send job details to workers who’ve responded
		i. Invite them for job interview
		j. Hire selected workers
\ta. Registration and receiving notifications on Xaba Shikanisha is free for workers\n\tb. Normal network charges apply.
\ta. On the App:\n\t\tSimply put the activation code sent to your notification number and click ‘verify’ to proceed.

a. On USSD:
		i. Dial *884#
		ii. Enter ID
		iii. Confirm ID
		iv. Enter PIN
		v. Select (1) Update Profile (for either PIN, Location, Language)
	b. On the App:
		i. Login to your account.
		ii. Click the Menu icon
		iii. Select My Profile
		iv. Click Edit Profile

a. On USSD:
		i. Dial *884#
		ii. Enter ID
		iii. Confirm ID
		iv. Enter PIN
		v. Choose (2) View Profile on the menu

a. On USSD:
		i. Dial *884#
		ii. Enter ID
		iii. Confirm ID
		iv. Enter PIN
		v. Choose (3) Change Notification Number on the menu

a. On USSD:
		i. Dial *884#
		ii. Enter ID
		iii. Confirm ID
		iv. Enter PIN
		v. Choose (4) Refer a Friend on the menu

a. On USSD:
		i. Dial *884#
		ii. Enter ID
		iii. Confirm ID
		iv. Enter PIN
		v. Choose (5) Add Profession on the menu

a. Download the Xaba Agent App on the Google Play Store or Apple App Store
	b. Register as an Agent
	c. Choose Become Agent on menu
	d. Enter your details and submit
	e. If successful, receive a notification to become an agent
	f. Start earning your commission.
You can find the terms and conditions on our website, www.xaba.org.
Xaba Points is a loyalty programme for all Xaba Agents. Each Xaba point is equivalent to KSH 5 upon reaching your target number of registrations.
Once you are registered as an agent, you are automatically included into the loyalty programme and can start earning points. The more workers you register, the more you earn.
For every worker registered, you will earn five Xaba Points. Once you have registered 5000 workers, you will be able to redeem your points.
Xaba loyalty points are redeemable after every 5000 workers registered. As soon as the target is reached, your points will be converted into cash and sent to you via mpesa.
The green bar on your dashboard illustrated your total balance. You will also be able to view your cumulative balance in your commission logs and statements.
